# earnings

Display Earnings that are expected to occur in the next business days. (Sorted by market cap)

### Usage

```python wordwrap
/dd earnings day
```

---

## Parameters

| Name | Description | Optional | Choices |
| ---- | ----------- | -------- | ------- |
| day | Date to get earnings for (YYYY-MM-DD) | False | None |


---

## Examples

```
/dd earnings day:2022-07-29
```
---
